(Requires attunement by a creature. The properties of this item are affixed to a weapon.)

This item is a @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.rules.JournalEntry.nniVtdJB1oyk5Sa3]{locus} and can be combined with other Loci per the @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.rules.JournalEntry.nniVtdJB1oyk5Sa3.JournalEntryPage.zI0VWGKnYZqz6sKd]{Combining Loci} rules.

While attuned, the relic merges magically merges with a weapon of your choice. This can be done during a short or long rest, and requires 10 minutes to complete. Once completed, the weapon becomes magical.

Effect: When affixed to a weapon, it gains a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls.

Special: When you take the attack action and miss all your attacks, you can make additional attack.
